response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and efficiency of your operations. The product is valued at $1,000,000 to you, and I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This exclusive offer is designed to help you maximize your investment while ensuring you receive unparalleled benefits. I look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your business goals. Please let me know if you have any questions or require further information.", "product_price": 950000}
